data.text:
Publish date: 2024-05-07

Highlights

Britney Spears' marriage to Kevin Federline was a fast and impulsive resolution.

The messy divorce between Spears and Federline was once basically because of Federline's partying way of life.

Spears has had a rocky relationship with Federline's wife, Victoria Prince.

Britney Spears has been within the information extra for her private existence than her music within the last couple of years of her decades-plus career in the trade. She is credited as the original pop princess and has accumulated an adoring legion of lovers.

Despite her accomplishments and repute, Spears has additionally had her percentage of troubles. She has gone via public breakdowns and a tumultuous court battle with her parents, whom she has claimed have manipulated and stolen from her.

One of Britney Spears' biggest scandals was her fast marriage and divorce to Kevin Federline. The couple percentage two youngsters, whom Spears is estranged from. Spears and Federline have not all the time observed eye to eye, and their dirty laundry has ceaselessly been aired in public. Not long after their divorce, Federline remarried to Victoria Prince. The union left fans questioning if Spears ever got along with her ex-husband's wife.

How Did Britney Spears And Kevin Federline Meet?

Early in her occupation as a pop famous person, Britney Spears got married. It wasn't to Kevin Federline, at least no longer then. It was once first to her adolescence friend Jason Alexander. While Spears were dating Alexander for a whilst, friends, circle of relatives, and enthusiasts were still surprised when information broke that the 2 had married.

Both of them had been very young at the time, and the marriage was once an elopement held at a Las Vegas chapel. The rapid marriage only lasted a few months, with Spears later mentioning the union as a rebellious decision. Alexander had a somewhat other view of their nuptials as he said that he surely cherished Spears but admitted that they were given married on a whim.

Not lengthy after Britney Spears' marriage and relationship with Jason Alexander ended, she met and fell in love with Kevin Federline, also recognized via his nickname of K-Fed. Federline used to be a luck in his personal right; he was once an actor, style, and DJ when he first met Spears.

While Britney Spears took heart stage in her sold-out concert events international, Kevin Federline took a extra subdued function as a backup dancer for several acts, akin to Destiny's Child, Michael Jackson, and Spears' ex-boyfriend Justin Timberlake.

Related: Kevin Federline Speaks Out Amid Britney Spears And Sam Asghari Divorce

In a document through US Weekly, Federline as soon as recounted how he met his then-wife Spears: "I met her at a club in Hollywood, Joseph's. Our eyes met, and that was it. We just hit it off right away. I was madly in love with her. Everything just seemed so right. I didn't see it as too fast or too slow."

Like her fast and private marriage ceremony with Jason Alexander months earlier, Britney Spears reasonably all of a sudden married Kevin Federline. The union used to be held at a non-public place of dwelling in Studio City, California, in entrance of a close circle of family and friends who had only learned of the nuptials hours sooner than it happened.

Britney Spears' And Kevin Federline's Messy Divorce

Although Federline had two youngsters in a earlier relationship with actress Shar Jackson, Spears had none. Still, the proficient pop famous person continuously spoke in the media about how she desired to become a mom.

Not lengthy into their marriage, Britney Spears gave beginning to their first kid, Sean Preston, after which Jayden James. The marriage ended now not lengthy after Spears gave birth to her 2d kid, with Spears in the long run ending their relationship.

Reportedly, the break up was because Spears may just no longer take Federline's unhealthy boy persona and way of life; she felt it had come between their marriage and was negatively affecting their youngsters.

According to a source cited by means of People Magazine, Spears had expressed that: "[It] was her last straw. He [Federline] said, 'I have to go to Vegas.' He didn't have to go to Vegas. He uses any excuse to party. She said, 'I've had enough.'"

Britney Spears' and Kevin Federline's divorce then took a drastic flip. Spears had wanted joint custody of their children, but Federline resisted at every flip. He made a number of claims that Spears used to be an unfit parent and cited psychological illness as her largest issue.

After Britney Spears had a number of stints in rehab, Federline was once awarded custody of their kids. Shortly after the ruling, Spears' used to be put under a conservatorship headed by way of her father and she or he was granted most effective occasional vising rights with her youngsters.

Related: The Real Reason Kevin Federline Has Sole Custody Of His Kids With Britney Spears

NBC News reported on a message Spears wrote on Instagram to her millions of followers concerning her conservatorship and relationship with her two kids:

"I've tried to my best at being the best person I can be...to be held hostage in homes under nurses and bulls--t. I hope my kids one day understand my reasoning. I send all the love in the world to you two every day for the rest of my life! My love for my children has no boundaries, and it deeply saddens me to know his outcry of saying I wasn't up to his expectations as a mother and maybe one day we can meet face to face and talk about this openly. I completely understand your need to live with your father as I had to play the perfect role for 15 years for absolutely nothing."

Over the years, Spears has seen her children, however their relationship has been a rocky one; added to the strain is the truth Spears has paid a really extensive sum in child support to Federline.

Britney Spears' Toxic Relationship With Ex-Husband Kevin Federline's Wife

Not long after Britney Spears divorced Kevin Federline, the latter moved on with another woman. That girl was once former semi-professional volleyball player turned particular schooling teacher Victoria Prince.

Federline and Prince met, perhaps surprisingly, after participating in a bowling ball fit by which the two belonged in a league.

After relationship for a whilst, Kevin Federline and Victoria Prince married and later welcomed two daughters named Jordan Kay and Peyton Marie.

Victoria Prince has been a permanent fixture in the lives of Britney Spears' children and Kevin Federline's different two youngsters with Shar Jackson. Although Spears' relationship with Federline had mellowed out a bit since their divorce, they have had their proportion of trouble.

Related: Kevin Federline Looks To Increase Child Support As He Risks Losing Money From Britney Spears When Their Son Turns 18

In a document by way of Just Jared, Spears alluded to the truth that she did not get along smartly with or maintain Prince. Spears wrote:

Being in a position to have cash FROM THE OUTSIDE international for the primary time is EXTREMELY ENLIGHTENING â¦ are we equivalent now ??? As in even equality ??? Reminder that the trauma and insults that come with popularity and this trade now not handiest affect me but my children as smartly !!!! Iâm handiest human and Iâve completed my best possible â¦ I truthfully wish to share my TWO CENTS !!!! I daringly would like for the Federlineâs to observe the BIG BOOTY VIDEO!!!â
